entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 11.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 8 May 2023
